attributes.action: Make Integrated & Functional Medicine an Integral Department of Health Care.
attributes.additional_details:
We have Interconnected Medicine Practitioners. They Practice systems-based unified medicine, proving to deliver better outcomes at lower costs for a range of chronic diseases, and community-based solutions offering significant cost savings for patients. 
Combination of this Medicine system with Collaborative care and other related they help patients to rethink about the suitability in the new era of healthcare. 
Therefore, I need to put the Integrated and Functional Medicinal System in the mainstream system in our Health Service and, need to make affordable for the people.
attributes.background: "Integrated & Functional Medicine" is a Personalized, Scientific & New Era of Healthcare and Medical Practice using Integrative,  Functional, Holistic, Homeopathic & Unified Treatment Approaches to Cure Most Complex Diseases.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like to happen.
